title: Amazing Detective Cases
additional-notes: A note in the 1969 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first issue renewal was recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, and was filed in 1969.

This was published as a fiction magazine from 1940 to 1950, then as a comic book from 1950 to 1952, and again as a magazine from 1953 onward. Issue numbering appears to have reset sometime around 1950.
